item.title: Diffeomorphic interpolation for efficient persistence-based topological optimization
item.description: Diffeomorphic interpolation boosts topological optimization by transforming sparse gradients into smooth vector fields, enabling efficient large-scale point cloud optimization and black-box autoencode…
